name: Inkstone
tag_list: engagement, mobile, applications, apps, apple, android, blackberry
description: The sweet spot in mobile development
overview:
ENGAGE THE MOBILE MINDSET.

At Inkstone we do more than build apps. We create brand relevancy by engaging customers in ways they value; sharing passions and interests, connecting to others, and getting real time useful information.

Our team has brought to market many successful mobile applications for leading brands like William Sonoma, Priceline, Griffin, and Mini Cooper. What’s our secret sauce? Our expert business and mobile strategists, and our mobile engagement platform - Reservoir.

Building an app should be an easy and exciting process, that’s why we work hand in hand with our clients through every step so they can watch their ideas come to life.

We understand that every client is unique and that you might just have an app idea or be well on the development process. With our end to end mobile solutions we can meet you where you are and help you engage your customers.

Learn more about our engagement process by visiting www.inkstonehq.com
